name: LOSANGLE
description: A play of the words Losango (rhombus in portuguese) and Angle, LOSANGLE is a fictional word that, much like this painting, mysteriously came from my subconscious mind. Following intuition, geometric shapes, light and color, dramatic effects and overpainting, the result is nothing technical. It is a mystery filled with unanswered questions, dazzling colors and hidden motifs. A subtle infinity is implied and one wonders... where does it come from? A riddle for you, and you alone, to uncover.
